body: Cabalamuse writes about the story of Moroccan "foreign fighters" in Iraq, retracing their trajectory from the slums of Casablanca to the prisons of Baghdad.
original_body: Cabalamuse writes about the story of Moroccan "foreign fighters" in Iraq, retracing their trajectory from the slums of Casablanca to the prisons of Baghdad.
title: Morocco: From the Slums of Casablanca to the Prisons of Iraq
